title.rendered: Team Momentum makes Christmas extra special for Mission Education children

content.rendered: Around 30 Team Members from Momentum joined around 100 of our children at Smile Foundation’s Mission Education centre in New Delhi. From making new friendships to creating interesting crafts together, there were many moments of joy and goodness. Team Momentum made Christmas extra special for our children!
